languages.text: {n}Регина оскорбленно краснеет и прячет глаза.{/n} "Прошу простить меня за дерзость, Ваша Светлость".
{n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Регина оскорбленно краснеет и прячет глаза.{/n} "Прошу простить меня за дерзость, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina blushes indignantly and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Détournant le regard, Régina rougit de honte.{/n} « Pardonnez mon insolence, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Détournant le regard, Régina rougit d'indignation.{/n} « Pardonnez mon insolence, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜尴尬地涨红了脸，移开了目光。{/n}“请原谅我的无礼，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜愤恨地涨红了脸，移开了目光。{/n}“请原谅我的无礼，大人。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Regina errötet und verbirgt ihre Augen.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine Unverfrorenheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina errötet entrüstet und verbirgt ihre Augen.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine Unverfrorenheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Regina se sonroja indignada y se tapa los ojos.{/n} «Perdone mi insolencia, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina se sonroja indignada y se tapa los ojos.{/n} «Perdone mi insolencia, {mf|milord|milady}».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}レジーナは憤慨して顔を赤らめ、目を隠す。{/n}「無礼な態度をお許しください、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナは憤慨して顔を赤らめ、目を隠す。{/n}「無礼な態度をお許しください、陛下」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Mahcubiyetten Regina'nın yüzü kızarıyor, gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Lütfen kusura bakmayın, küstahlık ettim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "Please forgive my insolence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mahcubiyetten Regina'nın yüzü kızarıyor, gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Lütfen kusura bakmayın, küstahlık ettim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
